testsuite.name: AppCommonTests: This class contains common tests that do not involve connecting to the database

testcase.name: Should leave the 'Card Month' field empty; expecting to get validation error - 'wrong format'
Should leave the 'Card CVV' field empty; expecting to get validation error - 'wrong format'
Should click on 'Credit' button; expecting to get the card entry form visible
Should click on 'Buy' button; expecting to get the card entry form visible
Should enter valid card data and make successful credit order; expecting to see 'Success' popup, not expecting to see 'Error' popup.
Should enter invalid card data and make failed credit order; expecting to see 'Error' popup, not expecting to see 'Success' popup.

testcase.name: Should leave the 'Card Year' field empty; expecting to get validation error - 'wrong format'
Should enter > 10 years expiration date for the 'Card Month' and 'Year' fields; expecting to get validation error - 'invalid card expiration date' for the 'Year' field
Should enter '13' for the 'Card Month' field; expecting to get validation error - 'invalid card expiration date' for the 'Card Month' field
Should enter expired date for the 'Card Month' and 'Year' fields; expecting to get validation error - 'card expired' for the 'Year' field
Should enter valid card data and make successful buy order; expecting to see 'Success' popup, not expecting to see 'Error' popup.
Should leave the 'Card Owner' field empty; expecting to get validation error - 'field must be filled'
Should enter invalid card data and make failed buy order; expecting to see 'Error' popup, not expecting to see 'Success' popup.
